messages.content: What are the benefits of using ComfyUI Pets?
Increased mental health, guaranteed 500% boost in productivity, and improved image generation speed by 0.0001 it/s.
How can I earn coins by using ComfyUI Pets?
With each image you generate, you'll also earn valuable coins.
What can I do with the coins earned?
Spend coins in the shop to feed and improve your pet.
How can I interact with my pet in ComfyUI Pets?
You can shower your furry friend with affectionate head pats and treat them to delicious food.
What types of games can I play with my pet?
You can engage in thrilling games with your beloved companion, challenge your pet to beat high scores, conquer obstacles, and embark on thrilling adventures together.
How do I install ComfyUI Pets?

To install ComfyUI Pets, follow these steps: 1. cd custom_nodes 2. git clone https://github.com/nathannlu/comfyui-pets.git 3. In your ComfyUI, right click and select 'Add Node'. Find 'Pets' > 'Comfy Pet'. 4. Enjoy your new buddy.
Are there other extensions or plugins related to ComfyUI?
Yes, there is a plugin called ComfyUI-Cloud that allows you to run your workflow using cloud GPU resources from your local ComfyUI.
